title: CLDF dataset derived from Bremer's "Sociolinguistic Survey of Six Berta Speech Varieties in Ethiopia" from 2016
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Bremer, Nate D. (2016): A Sociolinguistic Survey of Six Berta Speech Varieties in Ethiopia. SIL Electronic Survey Reports 2016-007. Dallas: SIL International.
